dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4914 IH: To prohibit funding to the Institute of Peace.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To prohibit funding to the Institute of Peace.

section.header: Prohibition on funding the Institute of Peace
section.text: No funds available to the Department of State or any other department or agency may be used to provide contributions directly or indirectly to the Institute of Peace.
